basic_information.scholarship_name: Outstanding 1st Year Graduate Student Award in Political Science

description: This scholarship is awarded to a Political Science major who exemplifies high academic achievement in their specific area of study and class standing. Eligibility Requirements Must be a graduate student Completion of 18 graduate hours or less Political Science, Master of Public Administration, or Internal Relations major Show strong academic performance (GPA) Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
